name: Scratch
description: Scratch is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its shiny yellow box and soldier-themed buttons and arms and legs, Scratch is a unique and eye-catching member of the club. Its screen is adorned with a cute cat design, adding a touch of charm to its appearance. To enhance its vision and analytical capabilities, Scratch wears a pair of stylish glasses as an addon. With its combination of functionality and charm, Scratch is a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
